Having been through a number of acquisitions in my career, I can safely say this is one of the best I have been a part of. I work in engineering and myself and other leads were immediately flown to headquarters upon close of the deal to start the integration efforts. This was done in the open with extensive input and participation from members of the acquired company.  We quickly established an aggressive roadmap that would integrate the two stacks and have never looked back. A lot of effort went into preserving a positive culture and in stamping out any ‚Äúus vs them‚Äù mindset or other toxic behaviors that can sometimes develop after an acquisition.To be clear, the pace is fast and the expectations are high, but compensation is excellent and the quality of people you get to work with is exceptional. I have consistently been given great opportunities to grow in my role here and have seen my peers offered similar opportunities regardless of whether they were from the acquired company or Roku native.If you enjoy working on hard problems with smart people, I highly recommend joining Roku.Hope this helps!
